headline: Trump warns of auto tariff hikes to spur U.S. investment
summary: Investing.com -- U.S. President Donald Trump signaled Thursday that he might increase auto tariffs soon to encourage carmakers to boost their investments in the United States.

headline: General Motors to Make an Investment of $4B in Three U.S. Plants
summary: GM to invest $4 billion in U.S. plants to relocate Blazer production from Mexico and supplement Equinox output amid tariff-driven production rethink.

headline: Ford Motor: Solid EV Momentum
